sentences.sContent: We do this because we believe in the dignity and value of every person.
sentences.sCn: 我们这样做是因为我们相信每个人的尊严和价值。

sentences.sContent: They have to be treated well, with dignity.
sentences.sCn: 必须善待申请人，让人有尊严。

sentences.sContent: This award must be shared with everyone who strives for justice and dignity.
sentences.sCn: 我一定要与所有为正义和尊严奋斗的人分享此奖。

sentences.sContent: ...that these extracurricular jobs were an effort on the part of the workers to regain their dignity after suffering the degradation of repetitive assembly line work in the factory...

remMethod.val: dign(有价值的) ＋ ity → 高贵

words.tran: 庄严的；有尊严的；高贵的
使高贵；增威严；授以荣誉

trans.tranOther: the ability to behave in a calm controlled way even in a difficult situation
